body: This was good but seriously needs a part 2, where he actually inserts the D inside her, sorry but that amount of foreplay is solely that for me, NOT ENOUGH.
Stiyl gets pushed aside after season 2, I always forget he exists
Yes but he wasn't her actual partner the only thing I really wish for is for index to be happy I don't care how she becomes happy she deserves happiness
Oh yeah I forgot Stiyl was Index's previous partner.
